snippet: Roger McNamee, a cofounder of the investment firm Elevation Partners, minced few words in a recent interview with Bloomberg Television, speaking his mind on the flaws of both Facebook's public debut and Zynga's management team.
abstract: Roger McNamee, a cofounder of the investment firm Elevation Partners, minced few words in a recent interview with Bloomberg Television, speaking his mind on the flaws of both Facebook's public debut and Zynga's management team.

headline.main: Tell Us How You Really Feel
